Are_you_sure_block_phrase.message: Are you sure you want to block this phrase? If you put to general phrase it might block you a lot of websites.

How_activate_Incognito.message: How to activate Block Site in Incognito mode

Password_protect_text1.message:
How does it work?

Right now you can set password only to protec the options but it is very easy to uninstall the extension. If you want to make sure that nobody will be able to access the websites you choose to block. This comes handy for parental control. Click "Get the premium functionality" and follow the steps.

Set the password here:

Password_protect_text2.message:
Premium functionality - Uninstall protection

Right now you can turn on the Uninstall protection where the entire site with the list of the extensions will be accesible only with the password. This makes the extension uninstallable so nobody can access the website you choose to block.

Follow these few steps:

1. Go to the list of chrome extensions and allow the extension in Incognito Mode. There will be no way how to go around this extension with Incognito mode. Read this article how to do it.

2. Activate the Uninstall protection here:

Password_protect_text5.message: NOTE: You need to set the password first

Password_protect_text6.message:
You are a Premium user but you haven't activated the functionality. Tick the checkbox to activate it.

IMPORTANT: Write your password somewhere so you wonâ€™t forget it. Because if you do, there is no way how to recover it or change it and you will need to reinstall Chrome.

If you need help with anything let us know on our support page.

Really_remove_actual_list.message: Really remove actual list and import list from file?

Whenever_the_blocked.message: Whenever the blocked word appears somewhere in the URL, it will be automatically blocked. You can use it for example to block specific search queries on search engines like Google or Bing. Be careful what you put in there. If you for example one letter to block, most of the websites will be blocked, so choose wisely.

appDesc.message: Block websites you don't want to visit ever again!

blocked_text100_2.message: Alright, since you made it that far, you deserve a reward. I will give you an echo when I will figure it out.

blocked_text10_2.message: What? 10 times? I am not talking to you. Try sharing this extension

blocked_text11_2.message: No! I am not talking to you.

blocked_text12_2.message: I told you that I am not talking to you.

blocked_text150_2.message: Still no reward for you for keep trying. There is no guarantee that you will get some reward

blocked_text16_2.message: Alright, you are starting to make me angry.

blocked_text1_1.message: Alright so you have tried it

blocked_text200_2.message: Alright here is your reward. The joke: What do cows do for entertainment? They rent moovies!

blocked_text22_2.message: I won't tell you this joke, because you keep trying.

blocked_text250_2.message: Alright you have some stamina. But stop now, you will hurt yourself.

blocked_text25_2.message: You look great, but that won't help you to get on this website

blocked_text2_2.message: I know that you will try this. But please stop now.

blocked_text300_2.message: Allright, since you are full of enery, I am going to tell you some jokes.

blocked_text30_2.message: How about instead of trying try to share this extension to your friends.

blocked_text320_2.message: You know that I am sad, that you are wasting time here?

blocked_text340_2.message: But at least you can have fun if I tell you some jokes.

blocked_text35_2.message: I will stop changing my quotes on the number of 36

blocked_text360_2.message: Don't forget to tell them to your friends, I am sure that they would love to hear them.

blocked_text36_2.message: The last post. I am done. Please stop trying now.

blocked_text380_2.message: What do you call a sheep with no legs? A cloud

blocked_text40_2.message: Seriously this is the last thing that I am going to say. Stop trying to reach this site, it is blocked by BlockSite

blocked_text420_2.message: What does a fish say when it runs into a wall? DAMN!

blocked_text460_2.message: What do you call a fish with no eye ? FSH !

blocked_text480_2.message: What is invisable and smells like carrots? Rabbit farts.

blocked_text4_2.message: Seriously? You should be doing something else.

blocked_text500_2.message: Why do gerillas have big nostralls? Coz they got big fingers!!!!!!!!!

blocked_text540_2.message: A magician was driving down the road..then he turned into a drive way...

blocked_text560_2.message: Two snowmen are standing in a field. One says to the other : Funny, I smell carrots too.

blocked_text5_2.message: I am begging you. Stop trying.

blocked_text6_2.message: I hate to tell you this, but this site is still blocked.

blocked_text7_2.message: I told you before, it is blocked.

blocked_text8_2.message: Are you hoping that it will eventually be unblocked?

blocked_text9_2.message: One more and you will hit two digits. This is seriously the waste of time.

prem_text1.message: BlockSite has now the premium functionality for you

prem_text10.message: Fill this form to bound your extension with the premium functionality or to access your account if you already  have one.

prem_text11.message: Great for parenting control. Nobody will access the websites you choose to block and the all the options will be unsurpassable. It is also useful for business and procrastination problems.

prem_text9.message: 60-day money back guarantee! No questions asked.

protection_popup_text1.message: Thank you! You are now the Premium BlockSite user.

protection_popup_text10.message: You need to allow this extension in Incognito Mode so it will be completely unsurpassable. Just tick the box "Allow in incognito"

protection_popup_text2.message: I can see that you already have the password for options so for the uninstall protection will be the same.

protection_popup_text3.message: You need to set the password right now.

protection_popup_text7.message: You are now ready to activate the Uninstall protection

short_passwd.message: Password must be long at least 5 character!

white_list_help.message: If you turn on whitelist, you will only be able to go to pages you have in blocked pages. Be aware, that this funcionality does not override blocked words.
